name: Aaron Swartz
title: Our Notes
knownFor: Co-founder of Reddit, RSS 1.0, JSTOR Protest
field: Internet Freedom, Civic Tech, Digital Rights
contributions: Built open protocols and challenged proprietary academic knowledge systems
bio: Swartz sacrificed everything to democratize information. His resistance to intellectual enclosure reminds us that code can be activism, and architecture can encode justice. His memory drives our free knowledge mission.
